description: This Java source file defines the AlarmClusterEvent class, which models a specific cluster event within a mock Zigbee core event framework. It constructs command payloads related to alarm actions in a Zigbee network.

classes.name: AlarmClusterEvent
classes.description: Represents a Zigbee alarm cluster event, capable of generating command payloads for alarm actions, including setting or clearing alarms.

methods.name: AlarmClusterEvent
methods.description: Constructor that initializes an alarm event object with the specified cluster, alarm code, and optional clear flag.

methods.name: getCommandPayload
methods.description: Generates the binary command payload for the alarm or alarm clear command, formatted as a ByteBuffer with little-endian byte order.
